title: MealBridge
description: This is a project made to redirect surplus food from gatherings to needy people.

title: Payment Tracking System
description: This is a project made to track payments in a shop environment for billing and record keeping.

title: AI-Powered Resume Ranker
description: Full-stack platform where recruiters can post jobs and students can upload resumes and uses AI-based keyword matching to rank resumes against job descriptions.
